cast.overview: With the aid of a fellow Auschwitz survivor and a hand-written letter, an elderly man with dementia goes in search of the person responsible for the death of his family.
cast.title: Remember

details.biography: Johnie Chase, originally from Windsor and now in Toronto, shifted from technical theatre to pursue acting and music. He gained recognition hosting "The Polka Dot Door" and has appeared in 'Made for TV' movies, series, and international films. Chase's stage experience spans Broadway, Theatre for Young People, and summer stock productions, while his writing ventures include a debut musical, "The Gospel According to Johnie Chase." Currently featured in the upcoming 'Made for TV' movie "Murder in the Hamptons," he's also a member of the Nathaniel Dett Chorale, showcasing his diverse talents.
details.name: Johnie Chase
